data.message: Complete safety invariant implementation workflow: 1) Define threat model (asset-first, attacker models, trust boundaries), 2) Derive safety invariants from threats, 3) Map invariants to enforcement layers (hookify rules, orchestrator checks, telemetry), 4) Test each invariant with positive/negative cases, 5) Fix false positives by scoping regex patterns, 6) Backup modified hooks to survive plugin updates.
